ResearchProjectDef.label: cultivation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Invest research into botany to gain an understanding of how to cultivate plants with properties relevant to magic and use their resources to supplement or fuel the arcane arts.

ResearchProjectDef.label: arcane facilities
ResearchProjectDef.description: Opens research into various facilities and workbenches that enabled the creation of unique magical items and effects.

ResearchProjectDef.label: arcane fundamentals
ResearchProjectDef.description: Basic research on how arcane power is linked to the physical realm and to other mages.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Magic Circle
ResearchProjectDef.description: Advanced research on the geometry and symmetry of ley lines that enables magic users to combine their energy to create incredible effects.

ResearchProjectDef.label: portals
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the construction of a portal - a powerful artifact that enables instant travel between colonies.\n\nRequires an Arcane Mage trained in Gateways to activate.

ResearchProjectDef.label: mana storage
ResearchProjectDef.description: Develops ways to store mana.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Arcane Forge
ResearchProjectDef.description: Develop the means of using arcane power to craft various items and equipment. Completion of this research will also reveal how to make Manaweave, a unique material that enhances arcane power.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Forge Replication
ResearchProjectDef.description: Enhances the Arcane Forge with a technique that allows it to extract the design from any craftable item and duplicate it at the forge.

ResearchProjectDef.label: arcane crafting
ResearchProjectDef.description: The first step in understanding the link between the arcane and physical. Enables construction of powerful gems of insight and magical equipment.

ResearchProjectDef.label: magical equipment
ResearchProjectDef.description: Applies knowledge of arcane crafting and enchantments to learn how to recreate equipment with more powerful magical properties.

ResearchProjectDef.label: arcane artifacts
ResearchProjectDef.description: Enables the recreation of arcane artifacts through extensive research combining knowledge of enchantments, ancient designs, runes, and rumors.

ResearchProjectDef.label: magicyte refining
ResearchProjectDef.description: Experimental research that identifies ways to use magicyte to create magical items. Develops recipes to create mana potions at the stove or gemcrafting table.

ResearchProjectDef.label: scribing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Develop the knowledge to mix ink with powdered magicyte and apply it through specially design press capable of reproducing scrolls and books that can contain the power of magic comprehension.

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced scribing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the use of higher quality material to develop more powerful books and scrolls.

ResearchProjectDef.label: master scribing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the scribing of master spells.

ResearchProjectDef.label: enchanting
ResearchProjectDef.description: Enables construction of the gemcutting bench and the crafting of tier I enchanting gems.

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced enchanting
ResearchProjectDef.description: Enables crafting to tier II enchanting gems.

ResearchProjectDef.label: expert enchanting
ResearchProjectDef.description: Enables crafting of tier III enchanting gems.

ResearchProjectDef.label: golem theory
ResearchProjectDef.description: Golem crafting is a brand of enchanting that diverges from passive enhancements and researches theories of manipulating magical enchantments for active purposes. This research will develop concepts of how to apply active enhancements to create magical creatures. This research enables construction of the stone and maharal golems at the stonecutter's table. The maharal golem can also be created at a crafting spot.

ResearchProjectDef.label: hollow golem
ResearchProjectDef.description: A magical approach to golem crafting which researches how to animate raw energy. Crafting this type of golem will require an arcane forge.

ResearchProjectDef.label: hollow equipment
ResearchProjectDef.description: Researches weapons and armor that may be attached to a hollow golem for further enhancement or capabilities.

ResearchProjectDef.label: hollow artifacts
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research into the union of arcane artifacts with golem behavior allow the hollow golem to fuel artifacts with its own magical energy.

ResearchProjectDef.label: mecha golem
ResearchProjectDef.description: Combines electrical and mechanical engineering with golem craft to create a robotic golem. A machine table is expected to be required to craft the components of the mecha golem.

ResearchProjectDef.label: mecha attachments
ResearchProjectDef.description: Researches methods of crafting attachments and armor to further enhance the mecha golem.

ResearchProjectDef.label: flesh golem
ResearchProjectDef.description: A biological approach to golems which researches how to mold the flesh and bones of dead organisms into a bipedal, animated construct. A simple butchers table should suffice for the crafting of a flesh golem.

ResearchProjectDef.label: flesh attachments
ResearchProjectDef.description: Researches weapons and armor that may be attached to a flesh golem for further enhancement or capabilities.
